actions: Promotes hair growth, promotes the healing of burns and generates flesh topically.
Warms the Middle Jiao, disperses Cold, dispels Dampness and kills parasites.
Treats sores, skin ulcerations and carbuncles and reduces swelling topically.

symptoms: Headache or a stabbing pain in the scalp precedes alopecia
May persist to develop into complete baldness
Body hair may also be involved
Thirst with a desire to drink
manifestations.tongue: Dark red or Purple with stasis marks

notes: Coarsely grind together all of the ingredients. Decoct in 500ml water until250 ml remains. Add 1 tsp honey and boil another five minutes. Drain the dregs and store the decoction in a glass container. Pour out the required amount and add 1/2 tsp ginger juice before applying. Apply twice a day.
